DESCRIPTION: Send a idea feedback to your server staff.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}idea Your idea** ~ Begins a series of questions to get all the necessary information to complete a idea.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **ADVANCED:** If you know all the questions for that servers idea. Split your answers with | and it will work as well.
ALIASES: Idea does not have any aliases.
NOT_ACTIVATED: The server has not enabled the option to send ideas. Please contact a server moderator or admin to enable this feature on your server.
NO_QUESTIONS: The server has not added any questions for the ideas. Please contact a server moderator or admin to enable this feature on your server.
NO_CONTENT: You did not provide any feedback to send. Please try again and include the message that you would like to send.
INVALID_CHANNEL: The channel that is set for receiving ideas is not valid. Please contact a server moderator or admin to set a valid channel before ideas can be sent.
MISSING_SEND: I am missing the **Send Messages** permission in the ideas channel.
MISSING_EMBED: I am missing the **Embed Links** permission in the ideas channel.
MISSING_REACT: I am missing the **Add Reactions** permission in the ideas channel.
MISSING_EXTERNAL: I am missing the **External Emojis** permission in the ideas channel.
MISSING_HISTORY: I am missing the **Read Message History** permission in the ideas channel. This permission is needed to add reactions.
SENT: Your idea has been sent, thank you!
CANCELLED: You have cancelled the idea submission.
SOLVED_DEFAULT: Thank you for submitting feedback. Your feedback was resolved successfully.
REJECTED_DEFAULT: Thank you for submitting feedback. The feedback you submitted was removed. For more information, contact us on the server!
